channel.title: Cache pack?
channel.description:
Well, I've got a problem with my Client and/or Cache. As i want to change some of my Tab-Icons, I saw that my clanchat and my logout button are a bit more at the top than centered. they look like this : [img]http://puu.sh/3dlqJ.jpg[/img]
I tried to use toms cache suite to open it and to export them and change them, but actually when i open it with toms cache suite the Window just freezes. I am using Galkons 602 Client, anyone may help me ? :[

item.title: Cache pack?
item.dc:creator: @shuhag shuhag
item.description:
@shuhag wrote:

Your clanchat and logout buttons are centered, they’re just too far down.

Also, you need to get the modified version of Toms Cache Suite. It allows bigger caches.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache pack?
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

Loveandpower:

any client/server errors?

No !
All I do is opening the cache on the Suite, and it does nothing. The Tabs (Extras and Help) wont work then anymore…

Read full topic
